attributes.action: Make all biometric data (face/iris/fingerprint etc.) copyright to the individual
attributes.additional_details:
The British Government, along with Governments across Europe, the States and elsewhere, is trying to create a total-control network that connects biometric data to banking, work, movement, spending and many other areas.

It is time for the British people (and those everywhere) to say 'enough'.  We are free and sovereign and we will not be controlled in this way.
attributes.background: Make it an offence to record, use, transmit or store any individual biometric information that is unique to that person without written permission, unless sent or offered voluntarily (with no adverse consequence for refusing) by the person

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/748522
